item.title: Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP) Sandbox on AWS EC2
item.description: This post demonstrates the process of installing the docker image of Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP) sandbox, used for exploring a single node Hadoop Cluster for Big Data Analytics applications. The installation is done on an AWS EC2 instance, running Amazon Linux 2. The HDP Sandbox makes it easy to get started with Apache Hadoop, Apache Spark, Apache Hive, Apache HBase, Druid and Data Analytics Studio (DAS). Learn more about the HDP Sandbox at: https://www.
